result.title: Suggested Readings in Dynamic Programming
result.content:
Al Salam Alykom All,

Dynamic programming is a very important topic in programming competitions, It's an essential tool if you want to reach yellow on topcoder for example, I don't know if it's getting much interest in IOI or not, but I think this is something you should learn before tackling other topics as greedy for example so I recommend those readings, you shouldn't try to read the solution before you attempt the problem itself and think about it, this way you maximize the benifit, the first tutorial introduces basic dynamic programming in bottom up only fashion, second tutorial shows some flavours of dynamic programming problems (You don't need to learn a dp type or so to solve the problem, you only need to understand the concept to solve the problem), and the third tutorial teaches you some how to optimize a dynamic programming solution.

Introduction to dynamic programming
Commonly used dp state domains
Optimizing dp solution

I Want you to share some of your favourite, recently solved dp problems with each other in order to learn from each other by discussion, I will also share some of mine, also feel free to ask questions if there's anything you don't understand.

There's no deadline for this, but make sure you finish it and solve enough problems before the next IOI.
